name: Mid Air Smash
description:
Mid Air Smash is a 4 player local multiplayer game about smashing on your friend's heads. Battle it out in short, fast-paced rounds of high skill action, with only 4 buttons per player (up, down, left, right).

  • Good old 4 players, 1 keyboard local multiplayer gaming! (More keyboards, more comfort)
  • Get competitive in short, faced-paced rounds of mid air smashing!
  • Very easy to pick up with only 4 buttons per player!

Notes: Currently you need exactly 4 players to play! With 4*4 buttons in use at the same time, some keyboards might not detect all key presses. Using multiple keyboards or setting up controllers to imitate key presses gets around this issue.

Thanks to Jordi van Betteray for co-creation of initial concept.
